channel.title: What does this mean

item.title: What does this mean
item.dc:creator: @Serberus7 Serberus7
item.description:
@Serberus7 wrote:

i geuss my server us pulling a nullpointerexeption i searched for nullpointerexeption in my client.java and heres what i found

		// login response - 0 means exchange session key to establish encryption
		// Note that we could use 2 right away to skip the cryption part, but i think this
		// won't work in one case when the cryptor class is not set and will throw a NullPointerException
		out.write(0);

here it is in code format if that is better for you

// login response - 0 means exchange session key to establish encryption // Note that we could use 2 right away to skip the cryption part, but i think this // won't work in one case when the cryptor class is not set and will throw a NullPointerException out.write(0);

what does this mean i dont know what to do it loggs every1 off my server and they cant logg back in my runserver.bat says something about a nullpointerexeption and then it says serbscape - [fatal] error

the fatal part scares me

Read full topic
